main.title: Cultivation
main.game_path_notify: Game path not found, remember to set it in settings!

options.background: Set Custom Background (link or image file)
options.use_theme_background: Use the background supplied by selected theme
options.check_aagl: For more options, check the other launcher
options.grasscutter_elevation: Method of running GC on restricted ports

help.port_help_text: Ensure this is the Dispatch server port, not the Game server port. This is almost always '443'.
help.game_help_text: You do not need to use a separate copy to play with Grasscutter. This is for either downgrading to 2.6 or if you do not have the game installed.
help.gc_stable_jar: Download the current stable Grasscutter build, which includes jar file and data files.
help.gc_fullbuild: Download a full Grasscutter build, including repo, jar, and resources. Is fully set up and does not require any other downloads from this menu.
help.gc_dev_jar: Download the latest development Grasscutter build, which includes jar file and data files.
help.gc_stable_data: Download the current stable Grasscutter data files, which does not come with a jar file. This is useful for updating.
help.gc_dev_data: Download the latest development Grasscutter data files, which does not come with a jar file. This is useful for updating.
help.resources: These are also required to run a Grasscutter server. This button will be grey if you have an existing resources folder with contents inside
help.emergency_rsa: In case something went wrong, force delete RSA patch.
help.use_proxy: Use the Cultivation internal proxy. You should have this enabled unless you use something like Fiddler
help.patch_rsa: Patch and unpatch your game RSA automatically. Unless playing with old/non-official versions (3.0 and older), this should be enabled.
help.add_delay:
Set delay in 3dmigoto loader! 
This should fix loading issues, but will add a small delay to when 3dmigoto is loaded upon launching the game. 
You can now launch with 3dmigoto again.
help.grasscutter_elevation_help_text:
The method used to allow Grasscutter to bind port 443 (which is not allowed for regular users on Linux)
Available methods:
  Capability - grant the Java Virtual Machine the capability to bind ports below 1024. This also allows all other programs running on that JVM to bind these ports.
  Root - run GC as root. This also allows the GC server, its plugins and the JVM to do pretty much anything, including sending your nudes to the NSA, CIA, and the alphabet boys.
  None - for no method. This requires you to change the GC Dispatch port.
